# DataScannerViewController.ScanningUnavailable.cameraRestricted

**Case**

The data scanner isn’t available due to user restrictions on the use of the camera.

## Declaration

```swift
case cameraRestricted
```

## Unavailable errors

- **DataScannerViewController.ScanningUnavailable.unsupported**: The data scanner isn’t supported on this device.

items.description: The data scanner isn’t supported on this device.
